Text.Value: W-who are you?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: He stops cowering and looks up at you - he opens up a bit, but doesn't stand up yet.

Text.Value: She'll be so mad. I didn't get the gold from the nest. I got to go.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The boy gets up from cowering starts to run after saying this, then stops and turns back.

Text.Value: Really? You think so? I'll tell Mol! Oh no...
Go back to your parents. There's worse in the wilds than harpies.
No - yes - I mean... I don't know!
I-I had to get the gold from the nest. Mol will be so mad. I got to go.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Amelie: starting from a standing position
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
The boy gets up from cowering starts to run after saying this, then stops and turns back. 

NOTE (Amelie): He's will be starting the line from a standing position.

Text.Value: Stop snivelling or they'll be back. They like tasty little tiefling kids.
Wauw... I'm Mirkon, I - oh no.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Amelie: Transition from Cowering to standing up in awe
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: He isn't cowering anymore- he's looking up at you instead.
EditorData.NodeContext: The player just introduced himself as monster slayer and bard extraordinaire - he's a bit in awe.

Text.Value: A-are they gone?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Cowering in fear (he's hunkering down, with his hands over his face/ears). Scripter note: Use the generic cower or some approximation for consistency with scripter animations.

Text.Value: Soothe the child with a calming tune.
Never mind that - are you all right?
Th-they're gone. Now there's just Mol.
You were brave, child. Heroic, even. You're safe now.
Th-that's what the voice said. I almost got to the nest, but the singing...
Calm there. You're a hero. You survived a harpy's wily lullaby, my friend. Be proud.
Take a breath, deep and slow. You're safe now.
*Sniff.*
I'm [GEN_PlayerName_c11eee1e-7815-6143-7233-f2427799fa53], slayer of monsters, teller of tales, saviour of you. The pleasure's mine.
I need to get back. Mol will be so mad.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The boy gets up from cowering starts to run after saying this, then stops and turns back.

Text.Value: They're gone. Are you all right?
A-aahhhh!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: the kid scrambles away and starts running.
EditorData.NodeContext: You were mean to the kid, who is now scared of you and running away, screaming

Text.Value: Wait, umm... you should meet Mol. She'll be grateful you helped me.
Find a boy called Doni. Tell him you want to see the 'Dragon's Lair'.

EditorData.NodeContext: soft - he's telling you a secret.

Synopsis: Non-critical path. The player has just saved the child from harpies that had enchanted and tried to eat him. He's shy and still scared.
